element-citation.article-title: Large-scale meta-analysis of genome-wide association data identifies six new risk loci for Parkinson’s disease

citation-alternatives.mixed-citation: Nalls, M. A. et al. Large-scale meta-analysis of genome-wide association data identifies six new risk loci for Parkinson’s disease. Nat. Genet.46, 989–993 (2014). https://www.nature.com/articles/ng.304346:9 [Internet]. 2014 Sep 1 [cited 28 Feb 2025].25064009
